'''''It's Yesterday Once More''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to collect and activate 10 [[Radiant Spincrystals]] for the [[Euphonium Unbound]] furnishing series.
